member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.CreateTable``1
member.summary: Executes a "create table if not exists" on the database. It also creates any specified indexes on the columns of the table. It uses a schema automatically generated from the specified type. You can later access this schema by calling GetMapping.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.GetAll``1
member.summary: Returns a queryable interface to the table represented by the given type.
member.returns: A queryable object that is able to translate Where, OrderBy, and Take queries into native SQL.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.Find``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve an object with the given primary key from the table associated with the specified type. Use of this method requires that the given type have a designated PrimaryKey (using the PrimaryKeyAttribute).
member.returns: The object with the given primary key or null if the object is not found.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.Filter``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the filtered data from the table with the given condition

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.Save``1(``0)
member.summary: create the table of the given type and inserts the given object (and updates its auto incremented primary key if it has one). The return value is the number of rows added to the table.
member.returns: The number of rows added to the table.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.Update``1(``0)
member.summary: Updates all of the columns of a table using the specified object except for its primary key. The object is required to have a primary key.
member.param: obj: The object to update. It must have a primary key designated using the PrimaryKeyAttribute.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.UpdateList``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: Updates all of the columns of a table using the specified object except for its primary key. The object is required to have a primary key.
member.param: obj: The object to update. It must have a primary key designated using the PrimaryKeyAttribute.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.Delete``1(``0)
member.summary: Deletes the given object from the database using its primary key.
member.param: objectToDelete: The object to delete. It must have a primary key designated using the PrimaryKeyAttribute.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.DeleteAll``1
member.summary: Deletes all the objects from the specified table. WARNING WARNING: Let me repeat. It deletes ALL the objects from the specified table. Do you really want to do that?
member.typeparam: T: The type of objects to delete.

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.DeleteList``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0})
member.summary: Delete a list of objects gieven to the mehod
member.param: obj: the list of objects to delete

member.name: M:MAUI_Template.SQLite.SQLiteRepository.DropTable``1
member.summary: Executes a "drop table" on the database. This is non-recoverable.
